channel.title: Post your code snippets here! [Updated 08/09/2012]
channel.description:
EDIT: This hasn't been touched for a year and a half, but it's worth updating now. This topic will be removed in the coming weeks/months and most of the snippets here will probably receive their own topic. If you are an owner of one of these topics, clean it up in whatever ways you deem necessary.
---
It has been discussed by members of this community that there should be a sub-tutorial forum for code snippets. This idea has been around for nearly a year, but has been described slightly differently each time and with a different name. MoparScape, you now have your chance to post code snippets. You [b]must post them in this topic only[/b]. Posting any code snippets, aka, 'five minute tutorials', aka, 'c&p tutorials', will result in the normal punishments.
To post a code snippet, take the code (and any instructions) and upload it [url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/]here[/url]. Then, in a reply to this topic, paste the link of the uploaded snippet. Also provide a description to the snippet with the link. I will sort all of them in a list below as the number rises. Do not try to hide any server addresses or malicious code inside the snippets or you will receive a harsh punishment. All snippets will be scanned before being added to the list.
Discussion is welcome in this topic, as is questions. I will do my best to keep this updated and encourage other staff members to help, if they choose to.
[ul][li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f3a1b7fed][317]Druidic Ritual for Deltascape by Goth Wolf[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f2d928d3][317]Stone style menus by I Samn I[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/ffc188b7][508]Godsword Crafting by Gods army[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f5a011ee2][317]Fix Item on NPC by jGod[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f68f0c395][317]Tokkul/gold Converter Commands by Mr Mopar[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f29efd2d][317]Deltascape Yell Command by Goth Wolf[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f7b3dfec1][317]Project Czar Eating Without a Weapon Fix by x pk3r xx[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f34664e5e][317]How to ban hosts by a net[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f5bccd6ff][317]Adding multi-combat sign 100% by faded vision[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f23680a4a][317]Increase Verac effectiveness against Protect from Melee by M A R T Y[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f3ad7ea23][317]Teleporting like 508+ by glabay[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f2fef156f][317]Barrows Degrading Armor by Teh Moose[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f34149bf3][317]Camelot Party Room by johnw1[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f58f4e360][317]Adding a Stock Market by fatwallet[/url][/li][/ul]
[center]---- *Updated* ---[/center]
[ul][li][url=http://java.pastebin.com/D3C8M3Yq][317]Adding a secure jailing system by Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/iDst8GwL][317]Modifying energy in Deltascape servers by runefreak10[/url][/li] [li][url=http://pastebin.com/f21ac2837][317]Skillcape emotes by cows1471[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/GuMx8KgE][317]Item on item explanation by xweetok599[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/f69daccae][317]Adding a working ring of health by John459[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/Zax9hGFP][317]Custom spell by ytuio9[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/d3vG506U][317]Adding a Zone System to your server by zyle1992[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/AGjZNgbs][317]Fixing rollbacks in project insanity and emulous by Pouch[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/fELtuJig][317]Controlling where you teleport by VbCoder[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/CRmjCSgH][317]Max range hit formula by Chosen Pkz[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/NA9rPmfx][508]Spawning a pet in Bulby by n10si t[/url][/li] [li][url=http://pastebin.com/bHqTSCg5]Drop party commands by RuneSpace[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/Gt6y9QGv][317](Delta)Food snippet by I Vain I[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/W5KpBWps][317](Delta)Complex bone on altar by I Vain I[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/xYxZ7NkW][317](Delta)Basic farming by I Vain I[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/QHs6aLWs][317]Player count by 1pure1337[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/zX6JYbhp][317]Recieving pk points in a specific area by staypuff[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/Kf5uyTVj][317]Trade chat and general chat commands by Evocation[/url][/li] [li][url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/p9Fw0Luy][317][PI]Mystery Boxes by Evocation[/url][/li][/ul]
REMEMBER TO USE THE [url=http://mscp.pastebin.com/]PASTEBIN[/url]! Don't just post the code in this thread. It makes our job a lot easier when updating this thread. Thanks!

item.title: Post your code snippets here! [Updated 08/09/2012]
item.dc:creator: @killerjens9 killerjens9
item.description:
@killerjens9 wrote:

This is a really easy guide.

Base: only tested on PI
What do this do?: when you click on the lamp “itemid= 2528” the lamp dissapear and you getting donator rank (lamp is tradeable)

  1. Open clickitem.java in source folder

  2. add this code if(itemId == 2528) { c.getItems().deleteItem(2528,1); c.playerRights = 4; c.isDonator = 1; }

  3. save and compile and your done

Was playing around with this the past couple hours, and thought i’d save some of you guys time before I start re-adding objects of my own

This includes:

  • The cleaning out of all the different types of objects, including decorations and walls
  • walls spawned on the west side so it looks neat and shadowed
  • Ready-to-add door at (3093, 3499) or (3093, 3500)

This does not include:

  • getting rid of the newly created awning roof
  • Minimap image

(This is from a delta, so idk if pi’s minimap will update)

if you do have a pi, then delta’s replace object params are (x, y, id, face, type)

item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

Here’s the configs for Party room 503+

   player.getActionSender().sendInterface(647, false);
            player.getActionSender().sendInventoryInterface(648);
            final Container<Item> store = new Container<Item>(215, false);
            for(int i = 0; i < store.getSize(); i++) {
                store.add(new Item(1048, i));
            }
            player.getActionSender().sendItems(-1, -2, 529, store);
            Container<Item> drop = new Container<Item>(215, false);
            for(int i = 0; i < drop.getSize(); i++) {
                drop.add(new Item(1048, i));
            }
            player.getActionSender().sendItems(-1, -2, 91, drop);
            Container<Item> deposit = new Container<Item>(8, false);
            for(int i = 0; i < deposit.getSize(); i++) {
                deposit.add(new Item(1048, i));
            }
            player.getActionSender().sendItems(-1, -2, 92, deposit);
            player.getActionSender().sendRunScript(149, new Object[] {"", "", "", "", "", 42401813, 0, 36, 6, 529, 42401819 }, "IviiiIsssss");
            player.getActionSender().sendAccessMask(1024, 42401819, 647, 0, store.getSize());
            player.getActionSender().sendRunScript(149, new Object[] {"", "", "", "", "", 42401814, 0, 36, 6, 91, 42401820 }, "IviiiIsssss");
            player.getActionSender().sendAccessMask(1024, 42401820, 647, 0, drop.getSize());
            player.getActionSender().sendRunScript(149, new Object[] {"Withdraw-X<col=ff9040>", "Withdraw-All<col=ff9040>", "Withdraw-10<col=ff9040>", "Withdraw-5<col=ff9040>", "Withdraw<col=ff9040>", -1, 0, 2, 8, 92, 42401821 }, "IviiiIsssss");
            player.getActionSender().sendAccessMask(1086, 42401821, 647, 0, 15);
            player.getActionSender().sendRunScript(149, new Object[] {"Deposit-X<col=ff9040>", "Deposit-All<col=ff9040>", "Deposit-10<col=ff9040>", "Deposit-5<col=ff9040>", "Deposit<col=ff9040>", -1, 0, 7, 4, 93, 42467328 }, "IviiiIsssss");
            player.getActionSender().sendAccessMask(1086, 42467328, 648, 0, 27);

And the drop timer config…

player.getActionSender().sendConfig(1135, time);

It’s in espeon not hard to convert to pali

Credits to The Killer i think…

-1, 0, 2, 8, 92, 42401821};

item.title: Post your code snippets here! [Updated 08/09/2012]
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

I take no credit in this was on RL so I just want to share with mopar aswell

[code]package com.rs.game.player.content;

import java.io.Serializable;
import java.text.DecimalFormat;

import com.rs.game.item.Item;
import com.rs.game.player.Player;

public class MoneyPouch implements Serializable {

private static final long serialVersionUID = -3847090682601697992L;

private transient Player player;
private boolean usingPouch;
private int coinAmount;

public MoneyPouch(Player player) {
	this.player = player;
}

public void switchPouch() {
	usingPouch = !usingPouch;
	refresh(true);
}

private void refresh(boolean swap) {
	if (swap)
		player.getPackets().sendRunScript(5557, 1);
	player.getPackets().sendRunScript(5560, coinAmount);
}

public void sendDynamicInteraction(int amount, boolean remove) {
	int newAmount = remove ?  amount - coinAmount : amount + coinAmount;
	if (usingPouch) {
		Item item = new Item(995, amount - (remove ? 0 : Integer.MAX_VALUE));
		if (remove) {
			if (newAmount < 0) {
				if (player.getInventory().containsItem(item.getId(), item.getAmount())) {
					player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You dont have enough money in your pouch. Your coins will be taken from your inventory instead.");
					player.getInventory().deleteItem(item);
				} else 
					player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You don't have enough coins.");
				return;
			} else
				player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(getFormattedNumber(amount) +" coins have been removed from your money pouch.");
		} else {
			if (newAmount > Integer.MAX_VALUE) {
				player.getInventory().addItem(item);
				player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Your money-pouch is currently full. Your coins will now go to your inventory.");
				return;
			} else
				player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(getFormattedNumber(amount) +" coins have been added to your money pouch.");
		}
		setAmount(newAmount, amount, remove);
	} else {
		if (remove) 
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(new Item(995, amount));
		else
			player.getInventory().addItem(new Item(995, amount));
	}
}

private String getFormattedNumber(int amount) {
	return new DecimalFormat("#,###,##0").format(amount).toString();
}

public void sendExamine() {
	player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Your money pouch current contains " + getFormattedNumber(coinAmount) + " coins.");
}

private void setAmount(int coinAmount, int addedAmount, boolean remove) {
	this.coinAmount = coinAmount;
	player.getPackets().sendRunScript(5561 , remove ? 0 : 1, addedAmount);
	refresh(false);
}

}[/code]

Buttonhandler.java (this will allow you to open money pouch)

[code]} else if ((interfaceId == 746 && componentId == 207) || (interfaceId == 548 && componentId == 159)) {
if (packetId == WorldPacketsDecoder.ACTION_BUTTON1_PACKET) {
player.getMoneyPouch().switchPouch();
} else if (packetId == WorldPacketsDecoder.ACTION_BUTTON2_PACKET) {

			} else if (packetId == WorldPacketsDecoder.ACTION_BUTTON3_PACKET)
				player.getMoneyPouch().sendExamine();
			else 
				if (packetId == WorldPacketsDecoder.ACTION_BUTTON4_PACKET) {
					if (player.getInterfaceManager().containsScreenInter()) {
						player.getPackets()
						.sendGameMessage(
								"Please finish what you're doing before opening the price checker.");
						return;
					}
					player.stopAll();
					player.getPriceCheckManager().openPriceCheck();
				}
		}[/code]

Everything below is Implementation for Player

Declare this in player.java

Find the method init in Player.java and put this :

under

Finally add the getter.

public MoneyPouch getMoneyPouch() { return pouch; }

all credits go to Cjay0091

item.title: Post your code snippets here! [Updated 08/09/2012]
item.dc:creator: @Notorious_Evolved Notorious Evolved
item.description:
@Notorious_Evolved wrote:

[CENTER]Features:

This has most up to date weapons and uncommon ones such as:

Ogre Bow

Longbow Sighted

Swagger Stick

Dreadnip

Brine Sabre

And More!

100+ Weapons Speeds

Note: I worked long on these, pretty time consuming leaving a thanks or a rep would be appreciated.

Replace Your: public int getAttackDelay

[CODE]public int getAttackDelay(String s) {
int get = 4; // default
String[][] getDelay = { {“dart”, “3”}, {“knife”, “3”}, {“Blisterwood stake”, “3”},
{“Shortbow”, “4”}, {“Karils crossbow”, “4”}, {" Toktz-xil-ul", “4”}, {" Dagger", “4”}, {“Bronze sword”, “4”}, {“Iron sword”, “4”}, {“Steel sword”, “4”}, {“Black sword”, “4”}, {“Mithril sword”, “4”}, {“Adamant sword”, “4”}, {“Rune sword”, “4”}, {“Scimitar”, “4”}, {“Abyssal whip”, “4”}, {“claws”, “4”}, {“Zamorakian spear”, “4”}, {“Saradomin sword”, “4”}, {“Toktz-xil-ak”, “4”}, {“Toktz-xil-ek”, “4”}, {“Saradomin staff”, “4”}, {“Zamorak staff”, “4”}, {“Guthix staff”, “4”}, {“Slayer’s staff”, “4”}, {“Ancient staff”, “4”}, {“Gravite rapier”, “4”}, {“Chaotic rapier”, “4”}, {“Armadyl battlestaff”, “4”},
{“Longsword”, “5”}, {“mace”, “5”}, {“axe”, “5”}, {“pickaxe”, “5”}, {“Tzhaar-ket-em”, “5”}, {“Torags hammers”, “5”}, {“Guthans warspear”, “5”}, {“Veracs flail”, “5”}, {“Staff”, “5”}, {“Staff of air”, “5”}, {“Staff of water”, “5”}, {“Staff of earth”, “5”}, {“Staff of fire”, “5”}, {“Magic staff”, “5”}, {“Mystic fire staff”, “5”}, {“Mystic fire staff”, “5”}, {“Mystic water staff”, “5”}, {“Mystic water staff”, “5”}, {“Mystic air staff”, “5”}, {“Mystic air staff”, “5”}, {“Mystic earth staff”, “5”}, {“Mystic earth staff”, “5”}, {“Battlestaff”, “5”}, {“Iban’s staff”, “5”}, {“Staff of light”, “5”}, {“Salamander”, “5”}, {“Maple longbow (sighted)”, “5”}, {“Magic longbow (sighted)”, “5”}, {“thrownaxe”, “5”}, {“Comp ogre bow”, “5”}, {“New crystal bow”, “5”}, {“Crystal bow”, “5”}, {“Seercull”, “5”}, {“Chaotic longsword”, “5”}, {“Gravite longsword”, “5”},
{“Battleaxe”, “6”}, {“warhammer”, “6”}, {“godsword”, “6”}, {“Barrelchest anchor”, “6”}, {“Ahrims staff”, “6”}, {“Toktz-mej-tal”, “6”}, {“Gravite 2h sword”, “6”}, {“Chaotic maul”, “6”}, {“Longbow”, “6”}, {“Zamorak bow”, “6”}, {“Saradomin bow”, “6”}, {“Guthix bow”, “6”}, {“javelin”, “6”}, {“Dorgeshuun c’bow”, “6”}, {“Crossbow”, “6”}, {“Zaryte bow”, “6”}, {“Phoenix crossbow”, “6”}, {“Sagaie”, “6”}, {“Bolas”, “6”}, {“Auspicious katana”, “6”},
{“2h sword”, “7”}, {“halberd”, “7”}, {“Granite maul”, “7”}, {“Balmung”, “7”}, {“Tzhaar-ket-om”, “7”}, {“Ivandis flail”, “7”}, {“Hand cannon”, “7”}, {“Dharoks greataxe”, “7”},
{“Ogre bow”, “8”},
{“Dark bow”, “9”},
{“Dreadnip”, “10”}, { “Swagger stick”, “10”}};
for (int i = 0; i < getDelay.length; i++) {
if (s.contains(getDelay[i][0].toLowerCase().replaceAll("_", " "))) {
get = Integer.parseInt(getDelay[i][1]);
}
}
if (c.usingMagic) {
switch (c.MAGIC_SPELLS[c.spellId][0]) {
case 12871: // ice blitz
case 13023: // shadow barrage
case 12891: // ice barrage
get = 5;

		default:
			get = 6;
		}
	}
	return get;
}[/CODE]

Credits:

I used IQuality’s OLD public int getAttackDelay and replaced it with my new weapon speeds

If I forgot any weapon let me know and i’ll add!
[/CENTER]
